column3: 2015) view/ create memorial website send sympathy card anderson-bryant funeral home 4 common st. stoneham
column5: fax: 781-438-0316 abfuneralhome@aol. com joseph william clinton whitmore
column10: died following a brief illness on june 19
column11: 2015. he was the cherished husband of sonja (johansson) whitmore with whom he had shared 31 years of marriage. born and raised in medford
column12: ma; he was the son of the late joseph w. c. and eleanor (dearborn) whitmore. joseph was a graduate of medford high school in the class of 1956. he was a salesman and general manager of hvac
column13: a heating and air conditioning business in which he took great pride. he previously owned a cab company
column14: garage and delivery service. joseph was an active member of the stoneham first baptist church
column15: where he served on the property and finance committees and the church mens club. he was a member of the king solomon masonic lodge. throughout his life
column16: it was important to joe to be physically fit and he enjoyed body building at a local health club. at age 65
column17: he earned his black belt in tai kwan do. in addition to his wife
column18: he leaves his sister marion warburton and her husband geoffrey of falmouth and several nieces and nephews. a memorial service will be held sat.
column19: july 11 at 11 a. m. in the first baptist church
column22: please make a memorial gift to the alzheimers association
